pages.text: The Bloody Clock is a special device that can be used to read the current Evolution Phase of the parasites. Phases mark substantial changes in both behavior and the species of parasites that may be roaming around hot spots.

$(#630000)I can also use this to read the current amount of Evolution Points we have collected, and if there is a global cooldown active, it will show how long it will last.$(br)If I am short on resources, a regular Clock used on a Factory will yield the same information.
